instructions: In a large, heavy saute pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped garlic, onions, and bell pepper; saute until soft.
Add meat; cook and stir until browned. Drain off excess fat. Stir in tomato sauce and cilantro. Simmer until cilantro wilts. Remove from heat, and cool until mixture can be handled.
Wrap 2 to 3 tablespoons of meat in an egg roll wrapper to form a triangle. Repeat with remaining ingredients.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or deep fry pan to 360 degrees F (168 degrees C). Fry patties in hot oil until golden brown. When done, transfer to plates lined with paper towels to drain.
title: Puerto Rican Meat Patties
sentences: In a large, heavy saute pan, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add chopped garlic, onions, and bell pepper; saute until soft.
Add meat; cook and stir until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce and cilantro.
Remove from heat, and cool until mixture can be handled.
Wrap 2 to 3 tablespoons of meat in an egg roll wrapper to form a triangle.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or deep fry
pan to 360 degrees F (168 degrees C).
Fry patties in hot oil until golden brown.
When done, transfer to plates lined with paper towels to drain.
